CustomField.description: Nationally influential companies we mobilize to advocate for federal climate policy based on our joint design principles. Level 1 = Intermittent contact with one part of the company. Company Receptive to outreach. Offers information. Level 5 = Receptive to outreach. Offers information. Takes action. Publicly supports federal climate policy and engages policy makers proactively.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Level 1-Intermittent contact with one part of the company. Company Receptive to outreach. Offers information. Level 5-Receptive to outreach. Offers information.Takes action. Publicly supports federal climate policy and engages policy makers proactively.
CustomField.label: CCL Level
